original_title: For Love Alone: The Ivana Trump Story
overview: Follows the triumphs and tragedies of Katrinka Kov√°r, a young Czechoslovakian ski prodigy who discovers high-society splendor in the arms of a wealthy American businessman. When lust turns to lies, Katrinka - long haunted by a burning secret from her past - sets out to find the love she left behind.
title: For Love Alone: The Ivana Trump Story
